channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 01:02 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 01:02 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Follow for further updates. #Vinnytsia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
